Texts.Chs: 昨晚上我醒着躺在床上。突然，一双双粗糙的手抓住了我。其中一只手压在我的嘴上。“别让我们看起如此难堪，”一阵低沉的声音说。天太黑了，我看不请我的对手。我试图反击，但他们把我压制住了。
Texts.Eng: Last night I lay awake in my bunk. Suddenly, rough hands grabbed me. A hand pressed to my mouth. 'Stop making us look bad,' a voice whispered. It was too dark to see my antagonists. I tried to fight back, but they held me down.

Texts.Chs: 第二天我醒来以后，我发现我所有的衣物都被撕碎了。显然，我错误地信任了我的同伴。他们的外表就是这样; 在虚假友谊掩盖下，藏着的是强烈的竞争心。好吧，如果他们这样捉弄我，我也可以全数奉还。虽说我不想依靠家人的钱，但这是必须的......
Texts.Eng: The next day I woke up and all my clothes had been shredded. Clearly I was mistaken to trust my peers. Their facade is just that; a false friendship masking severe competitiveness. Well, if that's how they're going to play it, I can play rough too. I was not going to fall back on my family's money, but needs must...
